Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, pink-grey in section, containing many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Frankfort 1933 / The Cenotaph of Seti I at Abydos (no.5(p.95,pl.xciii))
Jasnow & Pouls Wegner 2006-2007 / Demotic Ostraca from North Abydos (p.51)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51803) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51803)
